summary: THE REAR BRAKES WORE PREMATURELY.  IT WAS LATER DISCOVERED THE THERE WAS NO LUBRICATION ON THE CALIPER PINS OF THE REAR BRAKES.  THE PINS FROZE AND AS A RESULT, THE CALIPERS COULD NOT SLIDE.  THIS CAUSED PREMATURE WEAR OF THE INSIDE BRAKE PADS AND ROTOR SURFACES. *AK   *CB   *NLM   THE MANUFACTURER FAILED TO LUBRICATE THE PINS.  THE PINS WERE FROZEN INTO THE CALIPER BRACKETS AND COULD NOT BE LOOSENED AND REQUIRED REPLACEMENT.   *SCC   *JB
